content.p: Are you interested in experiencing different learning environment? Love meeting people from other cultures and enjoy travelling? Why not consider studying abroad! The University of Nottingham Malaysia (UNM) offers opportunities for full-time undergraduate students to spend part of their degree in a number of overseas countries. These opportunities are offered by the following programmes: Spend a semester or a year at a Nottingham Campus in the UK or China. Study abroad as part of the U21 programme or with one of our partner universities. telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8778 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8005
